trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the file name extensions.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Applies formatting to an error message, based on the data field where the error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the field that caused the validation failure.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Checks that the specified file name extension or extensions is valid.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A comma delimited list of valid file extensions.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the file name extension is valid; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
